input_text:
Job Title: Chief Marketing Officer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Marketing, Sales

Description:
Etna Interactive, a leading digital marketing agency serving the elective healthcare industry, is seeking a visionary leader to join our team as the Chief Marketing Officer (CMO).As the CMO at Etna Interactive, you will play a pivotal role within our organization, serving as the driving force behind our growth strategy. We are looking for an individual who possesses a unique combination of robust business acumen, a deep grasp of the digital marketing landscape, and the ability to inspire and lead teams while cultivating strong client relationships. In this role, you will lead by example, shaping our agency’s growth vision and providing strategic direction to our Marketing, Client Success, Project Management, and Product Development teams. If you are looking for a role where your expertise and imagination can make an indelible impact, then we want to hear from you!*While this is a remote role, candidates must reside in California, Arizona, Michigan, Washington, Colorado, or Georgia. 
Why should you choose Etna? We live our valuesFlexible and remote work culture that supports work-life balanceProgressive paid time off system where taking vacations and time off is encouragedOur peopleEveryone’s favorite part of working here is the people they work withWe are scrappy, curious problem-solversWe are considerate, fair, good humansWe are fun and pun-loving, passionate about what we doWe are tenacious, committed, life-long learnersWe care for our people and we provide uncommonly good benefits100% employer-sponsored medical coverage for the employeeA 401(K) plan with an employer matching component up to 4%Employer-sponsored life insurance and long-term disability insuranceAnnual profit-sharing program that allows our team to participate in the company’s success
Why should Etna choose you? Our firm has built a name for itself in the medical marketing space, and our people expect and deserve to work with a professional who has:BA/BS degree in Marketing, Business, or related field. In lieu of degree, 10 years relevant work experience; or equivalent combination of education and experience.A minimum of 5 years’ senior leadership experience within an agency in a capacity that influenced digital marketing strategies.A profound understanding of the digital marketing landscape and online marketing performance optimization.Proven ability to design and execute successful marketing campaigns that leverage creative content effectively.Possesses a holistic understanding of Website development and online marketing derived from personal experience.Exceptional communication, leadership, and decision-making skills.
What will you do as the CMO at Etna Interactive? At a high level, the CMO has the following responsibilities:Develops and communicates the agency’s growth vision, providing strategic direction to Marketing, Client Success, Project Management, and Product Development teams.Collaborates with the Client Success (CS) department to ensure client satisfaction, overseeing account strategies, fostering strong client relationships and guiding client retention and account growth.Works closely with the Marketing department to define and implement effective strategies aligned with agency goals and market trends.Supervises the Senior Operations Manager and guides management of change across the organization. Ensures customer satisfaction and company financial success by mastering project delivery and fostering collaboration between teams.Oversees Product Development to help create and improve innovative digital marketing products and services aligned with client and marketplace needs.Drives revenue growth through effective lead generation, client growth and retention, and product innovation.Builds and leads high-performing teams, fostering a positive and collaborative work culture while providing mentorship.Utilizes data analytics to measure and analyze the performance of marketing campaigns, client success initiatives, and project outcomes.Identifies and mitigates potential risks related to client relationships, project delivery, and market changes, implementing effective risk management strategies.Cultivates expertise in the industries and marketing channels we serve and guides expression of Etna’s thought leadership in the public marketplace.
Salary: The estimated base salary range for this role is $150,000.00 – $180,000.00 annually. However, it is important to note that compensation may vary depending on several factors, primarily the candidate’s level of experience and qualifications. At Etna Interactive, we strive to offer competitive compensation packages that align with industry standards and reflect the value of the skills and expertise that candidates bring to the table. The final compensation offered will be determined based on a comprehensive assessment of factors including (but not limited to) relevant work experience, educational background, demonstrated skills and abilities, and the specific requirements of the position.
 Application Instructions: To apply:Familiarize yourself with our company, our clients, and the work we do.Apply at https://www.etnainteractive.com/about/careers/ and upload:Your résuméA cover letter (PDF preferred)Applicants and future applicants, we want to emphasize that we will never send unsolicited emails to any applicants or future applicants. If you receive any email claiming to be from us but did not apply directly through our official channels, please disregard it, as it may be a phishing attempt.

Experience Level (if available): None

output_json.summary: Etna Interactive seeks a visionary leader to join their team as the Chief Marketing Officer.
preferred_degrees: BA/BS degree in Marketing, Business, or related field

Provides strategic direction to Marketing, Client Success, Project Management, and Product Development teams
Collaborates with the Client Success department to ensure client satisfaction
Oversees account strategies and fosters strong client relationships
Guides client retention and account growth
Works closely with the Marketing department to define and implement effective strategies
Guides management of change across the organization
Ensures customer satisfaction and company financial success
Master project delivery and fosters collaboration between teams
Oversees Product Development to create and improve digital marketing products and services
Drives revenue growth through effective lead generation, client growth, and retention
Fosters a positive and collaborative work culture
Uses data analytics to measure and analyze campaign performance
Cultivates industry expertise and guides thought leadership
Aligns with industry standards for compensation

output_json.company_information: Etna Interactive is a leading digital marketing agency serving the elective healthcare industry. They are known for their flexible and remote work culture, progressive paid time off system, and focus on employee well-being.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Etna Interactive is committed to creating a diverse and inclusive workplace where everyone feels valued and respected.
